bow: surrounded by natural parenting mothers often feel attacked about by choice to vaccinate my son this makes me feel so much better decided to share it with you all being against vaccines is one thing but when you attack people for choosing to vaccinate their own children that just pisses me off the worst is when they say do some research well have and ve concluded that vaccinations are what make sense sigh many pediatricians know will actually fire patients who refuse to vaccinate not only are they exposing their own children to crippling and deadly diseases they are exposing you and your children it is hugely irresponsible to allow these potential carriers of disease to come and sit right next to your other patients in the waiting room for example if they do vaccinate against rubella and your own immunity is not great even if you get vaccines they are equally effective in all people and we rely on herd immunity the principle that you are isolated from disease by the people around you being immune and thus not able to even carry the disease to you if they get rubella it is huge deal and they ll probably rub it in your face about how their natural immune system is helping them what they wo rub in your face is that fact that if they transmit that infection to pregnant mother they will cause horrendous teratogenic effects on the fetus fetus with congenital rubella syndrome can be born deaf blind and with significant cardiac congenital anomalies so personally feel nothing but contempt and disgust for people who are anti vax could agree more what some consider natural parent and never considered not vaccinating my baby considered an alternate schedule but decided against it vaccines save lives different parenting philosophies are fine and all but vaccines are not part of that they re necessary for the health and safety of all children ve never heard of people considering an alternate schedule what was the thinking behind that natural parent mostly just hesitant to put chemicals on my baby or let her eat yucky foods huge advocate for vaccinations though everyone has their opinions but feel bad for the kids this fad includes love facts with sources thanks for posting sometimes it helpful to not give all vaccines at once for medical reasons such as compromised immune system some parents decide to space out vaccines because of an overdose effect that they have imagined when not done under doctors supervision vaccines and boosters are less effective if not given within certain time constraints there is ton of research on combining vaxes my year old got shots on his month well baby my now 12 week old just had to only get and an oral vaccine combining them relieves some of the stress associated with them and since most mild side effects are the same for many of the vaccines under normal circumstances it better so that they only have one episode of side effects oh god hate the woo crowd you ca argue with scientific research and facts man read about it in dr sears book it just fewer shots at each appointment pushing back some shots for few months or even few years it gives the babe more time between them it seems bit silly to me now but was tad crazy while pregnant gt for medical reasons such as compromised immune system that would only apply to live attenuated vaccines though which are mmr varicella and opv oral polio not used in the usa there seems to be lot of confusion about what exactly is in vaccines other than those listed vaccines do not contain the virus bacteria that is harmful they often contain just pieces of the pathogen like specific surface antigen and attach it to something like sugar molecule so your immune system sees it deleted it funny do think ve ever met an anti vax person in the wild although apparently my state has rather large quantity of them http motherjones com environment 2014 02 vaccine exemptions states pertussis map good for you girl wo let my kids play with ones that do vaccinate caught whooping cough before my second pregnancy and still opted for the shot while pregnant let me tell you ai nobody has time for three months of intense sick and coughing ca imagine how bad it would have been if one of my kids had gotten it no thank you anyone who does vaccinate is just being foolish they risk other people and babies lives like being natural mama but also like being smart mama breastfeeding for over year organic food co sleeping baby wearing ~respecting my kids individuality attachment parenting we do them all dying from diseases is natural thing but no thanks sure this will get downvoted to hell but am firm believer that proper education and well written understandable evidence works far better than bullying as ve seen both sides of the argument are equally guilty for playing the bully vs victim vice versa card neither influences are effective in such topic please learn how to be kind no matter how stupid you think someone choice is it may just be that they are misinformed and require correct information or resources really not everyone has the same level of sensibility come on now there no reason to be dickish either way completely agree feel judged and looked down on because choose to vaccinate my child have had to exclusively pump for her because you know it does count unless it comes directly from the nipple among other things my child has several severe heart defects and actually qualifies for synagis the rsv vaccine not vaccinating never crossed my mind but have lived in and visited countries where there are still some of these diseases what first world problem to have to make this decision on whether or not to vaccinate my brother is actually allergic to the vaccine for pertussis we had to watch where we went at certain times of the year so he would be exposed to outbreaks ca imagine how stressful that was on my mother think the less we associate anti vax with natural parenting and more with the backward afraid of doctors spirit crystal using what your sign set the better we ll all be it makes me kinda laugh when people say they researched it and decided against vax like are you scientist do you have microscope research grants does seem like the kind of thing you could research by reading couple blogs an attorney and it sounds like when someone tells me they have researched the law do understand what point you re trying make the fact that portion of the world is vaccinated makes you feel better the part where 70 of unvaccinated children come from 10 countries and you do live in any of them makes you feel better posting something that you feel discredits people who make choices different from yours makes you feel better all for people making whatever choice is right for their family you should be criticized for your choice to vaccinate it private decision that is up for discussion in the first place couldnt agree more am all about natural parenting and do not like being associated with anti vax just because choose to avoid flame retardants and plastics doesnt mean am anti vax yes my homeschooling group is split on this issue right now especially with the measles outbreak in our area was the first vaxxer to speak up but unfortunately the anti vaxxers tell lot louder they counter with you have to look at the research on both sides which of course has no scientific fact behind it the worst part is these people are actually looking for people to expose their children to ew do some research that one really bothers me because it generally accompanied by some random blog full of unsupported claims about the dangers of vaccines and all the harmful chemicals they contain saw one facebook shared picture that said they contained aborted fetal tissue really ll take some science now please awesome map in super light pink land yay think the point is that the people op is surrounded with are choosing not to vaccinate to other people detriment and this logically explains why vaccinations are good their choice does just affect their family but everyone around them because of herd immunity what about people who have compromised immune systems or people who are allergic to compounds in vaccinations there is hardly anything private about disease when it comes to vaccinating and it is very much up for discussion as it should be it may be private decision but it effects more than just your child it effects the children they play with and are around except for the fact that anti vaxxers put everyone in danger this is not debate with two equal sides one side is undeniably correct accepting anti vaxxers as having reasonable viewpoint is dangerous to our lives unfortunately we now have studies proving that the more evidence you show the anti science anti vaxxers the more staunchly they believe in their conspiracy theories really the only solution is to repeal the laws allowing people to have non medical exemptions for vaccines pretty crunchy granola too coconut oil cloth diapers babywearing hoping to breastfeed until she weans herself etc etc but anti vax is not part of that paradigm **understand** how vaccinations immunizations and herd immunity work *naturally* people died from these diseases how stupid can people get wanting to go back to that they mean watch the drs and read dr mercola website people have said this to me too and just wish
